Chapter 426:
The King Chapter 426: aftermath

Passing around the battlefield, Hudson sighed as he looked at the aggregated casualty figures.

One will succeed and ten thousand bones will die.

The battle last night is the best portrayal. The situation of the expeditionary army was fine. It was a sneak attack, and it was the enemy's tired soldiers. The casualties were only more than 2,000 people.

Compared with the glorious record of defeating 300,000 enemy troops, beheading 120,000, and taking 50,000 prisoners, it can be called an "epic victory".

The kingdom's army did not suffer much, but the defenders of Fort Augustus suffered. As the bait thrown out by Hudson, the defenders killed a total of 70,000, and almost everyone who survived was wounded.

If it weren't for being trapped in the inner city with no place to run, with such a casualty figure, the army would have collapsed long ago.

Of course, the death toll of 70,000 also includes the loss of the outer city during the day. The battles are connected together, and the defenders have no way to separate the loss of troops.

"Arrange someone to pass the good news back! Everyone is waiting impatiently, and we need this news to stabilize people's hearts."

Hudson said blankly.

War always requires sacrifice, and in order to win, it is worth paying any price. Being able to win with the least cost proves that the commander is qualified.

Did not comfort the wounded hearts of the officers of the Principality of Moxi, Hudson believed that they could all come out.

The casualties were heavy, and it was not worth mentioning in front of the good news. No matter how many troops are lost, the Principality of Moxi will make up for them.

In the eyes of many princes and nobles, the loss of soldiers has always been just a set of cold numbers.

Especially among the defenders of Fort Augustus, there are still a large number of defeated soldiers of the Eastern Warhammer Kingdom, and now they are buried on the battlefield. Maybe they feel that a hidden danger has been eliminated.

"Yes, Marshal!"

Raquel immediately replied.

It can be seen that he has adjusted his mentality. Whether it is a strong heart, or really don't care, these are the necessary qualities for a general.

Immersed in the subordinates, the people suffered heavy losses and could not extricate themselves. It seemed that they valued love and righteousness, but in fact it was an irresponsible approach.

The battlefield is ever-changing, no matter at any time, no matter what happens, the general must keep himself rational.

The two of them tacitly did not mention the "abandoned son attack" deliberately arranged last night.

The city was broken by the enemy, and it was definitely not the coach who deliberately showed his flaws and led them into the city.

The truth can only be hidden in the long river of history, and there is no need to put everything on the surface. Sometimes knowing too much is not good for everyone.

As for whether someone will guess it, it is not important at all, the winner is not to be blamed.

After nodding, Hudson added: "The issue of the prisoners of war has also been reported.

Except for the hundreds of elf captives, I promised to abide by the ancient "Covenant of Ten Thousand Races" and give them the treatment of prisoners of war. How to deal with the rest of the prisoners of war is for the governments of the two countries to negotiate!

Remark: In order to politically lure the ancient survivors to surrender, it is not recommended to slaughter captives. "

The hatred of race wars is so deep that unless one side is completely down, the fight will continue.

Powerless to change the overall situation, but the promise he made must still be fulfilled.

Even if everyone knows that the elf captive is valuable and it is impossible to pull it out and chop it, Hudson has to make a gesture.

The suggestions made later are actually decisions. Reporting is just a process to show respect for the high-level governments of the two countries.

From the moment he spoke, the fate of fifty thousand prisoners of war had already been decided.

Regarding the trend of future wars, coupled with the weight of "good news", it is impossible for any smart politician to reject Hudson's proposal.

Of course, apart from keeping these captives in order to carry out political surrender in the future, the core reason is that these ancient survivors belong to the cherished race.

In the entire alliance of the ancient survivors, even the largest race does not have a million people.

Affected by the number of tribesmen, no matter how these small races develop, they do not have the ability to threaten the supremacy of the human race.

There are so many races that have disappeared in the long river of history. These small races with extremely low resistance to risks may be cold at some point.

A major earthquake, a major flood, an extreme cold weather, a cult rampage... Any major natural disasters and man-made disasters may destroy them.

"Good news!"

"Victory at Fort Augustus!"

…

When the news reached Da Pest, everyone's first reaction was to not believe it.

Yesterday, Fort Augustus was still asking for help, and everyone held a special meeting to discuss sending troops for reinforcements. Today, the good news came, so fooling the children!

Being stared at by everyone, Earl Martins hurriedly explained: "Reinforcements have arrived!

Last night, the alien allied forces invaded the inner city. At the most dangerous moment, Marshal Hudson led the army to the battlefield and fought back with the defenders of Fort Augustus.

In this campaign, 300,000 enemy troops were defeated, 120,000 enemy troops were beheaded, and 50,000 enemy troops were captured, which completely reversed the unfavorable situation since the war began.

But we also paid heavy casualties, the number of casualties alone is..."

Before the Minister of Military Affairs finished speaking, George interrupted: "Stop!

Let us digest this good news first, and we will talk about the casualties later. "

The reversal of the war situation was too sudden. If everyone was not in good health, they would have been scared out of trouble.

Simply relying on the defenders of Fort Augustus, even if they were all wiped out, they would not be able to seriously injure the enemy.

With the addition of reinforcements from the Alpha Kingdom, everything will be different.

Moxi Principality is Hudson's famous place, and his influence here is greater than that in Alpha Kingdom.

As a victorious general, no matter what kind of great victory, as long as it is on his head, everyone can accept it.

"Congratulations, Your Majesty, after this battle, the strategically passive situation of the Principality will be completely reversed.

It may not be long before we receive news that Marshal Hudson is going to war against the Eastern Warhammer Kingdom. "

Prime Minister Herceg said excitedly.

Originally, everyone was prepared to fight on two fronts, but they never expected that Hudson would take down the enemy army as soon as he made a move.

Although there are still hundreds of thousands of allied forces of the ancient survivors on the front line of Fort Augustus, the battle last night fundamentally changed the balance of strength between the two sides.

War is the morale of the army. Before the arrival of the reinforcements, the morale of the Principality of Moxi was affected by the defeat of the army, and the combat effectiveness of ten percent could only be used to four or five points.

Now that the situation is reversed, it is the turn of the Alliance of Ancient Remnants to have a headache.

The morale of the army was frustrated, and the troops were scattered in various places to suppress the rebels. They could all see such an obvious fighter, so there's no reason the frontline coaches couldn't spot it.

As soon as the counterattack war started, the battlefield was transferred from the Principality of Mosi to the Kingdom of East Warhammer. The northern provinces have a chance to breathe, and the principality's war potential will be preserved to the maximum extent.

If the counter-offensive goes well, it can also affect the front line of the Principality of Orton, forcing the enemy to send troops back to help, and the follow-up war will be easier to fight.

“Now is not the time to celebrate.

The Alpha Kingdom sent a small number of reinforcements this time. Nominally, there is an army of 100,000, but in fact there are only 35,000 people.

Although they are all elite cavalry, with such a small force, they can only fight encounters in the wild.

If it is not necessary, Marshal Hudson will not keep prisoners. You must know that in the last time the orcs invaded, he did not keep a single prisoner. "

George shook his head and said.

In fact, he was thinking too much.

The last time the orcs invaded, Hudson did not keep any prisoners because there were no prisoners.

The Alpha Kingdom and the orcs have a deep hatred. When the people below see the orcs, they want to devour their flesh alive. To keep the captives is to fight against the officers and soldiers.

Combined with the clear attitude of the high-level kingdom, directly ordering not to take prisoners, Hudson will naturally not violate the military order for a group of orcs.

At the end of the war, in order to split the orc empire, Hudson deliberately let the vassal races go, and specifically caught the five royal families and beat them hard.

If it wasn't for the intervention of the Human Race Alliance, Hudson was sent to do logistics and lost the dominance of the war, maybe the Orc Empire would have been torn apart.

The current situation is the same. It seems that Hudson is fighting the military, but in fact he is fighting the political battle together.

It's just that this kind of gameplay is not in line with the mainstream of the Aslante continent, and there are no ready-made cases to learn from. Everyone didn't understand it for a while.

"Your Majesty is right. If there is only one enemy, the Allied Forces of the Remnants of the Ancients, our odds of winning the next war are indeed very high.

But apart from this enemy, there are also elves who have just joined the war.

The three principalities of Kantruo, Usta, and Fick have been suppressed by the elves for a long time, and their own military strength is limited, so they can't resist for a long time.

Once the Three Kingdoms fall, the elves army is likely to join forces in the Principality of Orton and the coalition forces of the ancient survivors. That will be the real test of life and death for the Principality! "

Count Renato threw cold water.

In order to stabilize the elves, not only the Alpha Kingdom is working hard, but the Principality of Moxi has actually done more.

The idea is beautiful, but the reality is very cruel.

It involves racial strategic security, and it cannot be fooled by diplomatic means.

"The threat of the elves is indeed a big problem, but now we have to solve the alliance of the ancient survivors first.

Count Martins, on behalf of the Principality, you personally go to the front line of Fort Augustus, ask Marshal Hudson about the next strategic deployment, and appease the morale of the army by the way.

If there is any need on the front line, the Principality will do its best to cooperate.

If you can hit the alliance of the ancient survivors before the arrival of the elf army, there will be more talk later. "

George said helplessly.

Victory is gratifying, but the deteriorating international situation still makes him uneasy.

At one point, he wanted Hudson to lead the reinforcements southward, to deal with the ancient remnant army from the front line of Orton first, so that no one would resist when the elf army came.

Fortunately, reason finally prevailed. The reinforcements of the Alpha Kingdom were not under his command, and it would be embarrassing if the order was not followed by others.

The process is different, but the ultimate goal is astonishingly the same for everyone—to fool the army of elves away.

Deep in his heart, George was even mentally prepared. After the Continental War was over, he would act in the Terran Alliance and encourage the Alliance to launch a strategic strike against the Elves.

As the overlord of the mainland, the human race can easily disable the opponent if it takes action against any foreign race.

Of course, the Dragon and Sea clans cannot be counted.

The former has too many perverts, and the living area of ​​the latter is a forbidden area for human beings.

…

Emerald Palace.

Because of the distance, Caesar IV received the good news a little later, but the joy brought by the victory remains the same.

The big victory at the beginning made the ministers who were hesitant about this action all change their tunes and sing praises.

In the face of victory, armed training has turned into a surprise attack on the battlefield, and it has also become "adapt to the situation and seize the opportunity" among the people.

No problem, taking advantage of the enemy's siege to launch a surprise attack in the middle of the city and winning a big victory, a proper classic case of war.

The smart nobles secretly took out their small notebooks and recorded what they learned.

These are the teaching materials for the younger generations to learn in the future. In the era when there was no military academy system to train officers, the training of officers relied entirely on the accumulation of experience of the older generation.

The heroes are all on the front line, so the celebration banquet is naturally saved.

The current Alpha Kingdom is implementing a strategic ration rationing system, and any extravagance and waste is not allowed.

In recent days, whenever they appear in public, everyone eats black bread and vegetables.

Affected by this, domestic entertainment venues, restaurants, and hotels have all been hit hard.

The two cannot be combined, and the implementation of any policy cannot avoid trade-offs.

Anyway, most parts of the kingdom implement the tax-subsidy system, and if they want to cry, the tax-subsidy guy will cry, and the commercial tax revenue of the treasury will hardly be affected.

As a person with vested interests, if you don't have this kind of dedication, then you don't have to do it.

"Everyone has seen the battle report, what suggestions do you have for the handling of prisoners of war?"

Caesar IV said with a smile.

Hudson only asked not to kill the prisoners, but did not say how to deal with the prisoners of war. The troops on the front line will continue to go out and have no time to watch the prisoners of war. The follow-up work will be taken over by the governments of the two countries.

"Your Majesty, the defenders of Fort Augustus suffered heavy losses, and the hatred has just been forged, and this moment is the time when the anger is the greatest.

If the Mosi people want to receive prisoners of war, they must ensure that they cannot use the defenders and warhammers of Fort Augustus to detain them.

Marshal Hudson did not mention it, probably because he was concerned about the feelings of the frontline officers and soldiers. After all, they may need their cooperation in the following battles.

You can test the Moxi people's thinking. If they have no special requirements, the two countries will jointly send troops to guard them.

For the sake of safety, the kingdom should immediately prepare a batch of anti-magic potions and give them to the prisoners of war. "

The Grand Duke of Newfoundland proposed.

"Prime Minister, other issues are easy to discuss. But the anti-magic potion cannot be produced by the Kingdom's family. There are 50,000 prisoners at the beginning of the war. It is not yet known how many people will be arrested in the future.

The number of cultivators among them, even if it only accounts for one-tenth, the required anti-magic potion is a very large number.

Anti-magic potions on the market, even the most rubbish, cost 30 gold coins to start with. With such a large quantity, even if the kingdom organized production, the cost would probably not be less than ten gold coins.

The price of high-grade anti-magic potion for the strong is even higher.

Besides cultivators, we also have to give them drugs to reduce their physical strength, otherwise it will be too difficult to take care of some races with special talents.

The Kingdom's fiscal revenue is limited, and it may be unbearable to add huge expenses all of a sudden. "

Marquis Delgado objected immediately.

Allies also have to settle accounts clearly. It's fine to help fight the war, and it's no fun to help pay for it.

It's just that the proposal of the Minister of Finance has not been approved by everyone. It is true that the kingdom is short of finances. How can the Moxi Principality be rich during the war?

What's more, most of their magicians are now recruited to the battlefield, and the rest are also engaged in the production of military materials.

There are many difficulties in the first place, and if they are asked to produce anti-magic potions, they will not be able to do it!

In the eyes of everyone, it is a miracle that the Moxi Principality, which is heavily in debt, did not go bankrupt.

If the Principality of Moxi cannot hold on and goes bankrupt during the war, and the mess left behind has to be taken over by the Alpha Kingdom, then it is really asking for trouble.

"Marquis Delgado, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs can communicate with the Mosi people about the issue of magic potions, but considering the actual situation, the kingdom will most likely have to pay in advance for the required expenses.

After all, under the current situation, we and the Moxi people are all damaged, so we can't care about that much.

All issues will be discussed after the war. "

Earl Francis said helplessly.

No money means no money, and we cannot hope to extract oil from the poor. Talking after the war is purely a word of comfort. It is a miracle that the Mosi people did not declare bankruptcy after the war.

Even the kingdom's finances will most likely go bankrupt after the war. The Treasury has done everything it can to amass money in order to wage this war.

Some regions where the tax is paid by businessmen are expected to be 30 to 50 years later. Even the tax-encompassing area for nobles and lords has been received in advance five years later.

Even so, finances remain tight. There is no way, the mess left by the last war has not been cleaned up yet. Catch up with a new war again, leeks are not enough!

The issue of rewards for military exploits was not even mentioned by anyone. Let's wait for a while, and settle the settlement after the war. At least the Ministry of Finance can reserve some cash in its hands.

The aristocratic group is still conscious in this regard, and the great aristocrats personally take the lead and set an example, but no one makes a fuss.

If the performance is outstanding on the battlefield, the officers from the great aristocrats will even reward them out of their own pockets. In order to boost the morale of the army, everyone also worked hard.

The officers and soldiers who followed Hudson gained the most, but he was grabbing supplies from the enemy to share the loot, not paying for it himself.

"Post-war processing is also okay, but the additional cost must be found a way to finance it.

Throttling is impossible, so only open source is left. Either impose a war tax, or collect a year's business tax in advance.

You can figure it out, anyway, the Ministry of Finance is powerless. If everyone has a better solution, the Ministry of Finance promises to fully support it. "

Marquis Delgado spread his hands and said.

Everyone wanted to speak up to refute, but they didn't know where to start. According to past experience, if a question is raised at this time, the Chancellor of the Exchequer will immediately send a thick list of account expenses.

There is no doubt that the money was spent by the military. Strengthening the defense line, training the army, raising strategic materials, purchasing ordnance and equipment...all of these cost money.

Even though most of the materials are prepared from within the country, gold coins are still used for settlement. Materials within the scope of the obligation do not require money, but kingdoms beyond the scope can also be bought with money.

Everyone's profits can be turned into debts, but the production costs still have to be paid, otherwise no one can hold on to the loss-making business.

In the last war, the large sum of war bonds subscribed by the nobles of the kingdom basically came from this way. If it is true that everyone is asked to spend a huge amount of cash at one time during the war, few companies can do it.

Chapter 427:
The King Chapter 427: Elven Queen's Will

Fort Augustus, after the expeditionary force took a brief rest, Hudson continued to lead the team to expand the results.

Compared to hard battles on the battlefield, beating a dog in the water is the easiest way to achieve results.

In just two or three days, the expeditionary force added 15,000 beheads and 40,000 prisoners. This number is still increasing, and Hudson has no time to report victory to the country.

The sequelae of the disunity of the command of the Alliance of the Ancient Remnants was fully exposed at this moment. After the army was defeated, all ethnic groups could only fight on their own, and there was no effective resistance organized at all.

Otherwise, if hundreds of thousands of troops are integrated together, even if the morale of the army is frustrated, they can choose a dangerous terrain and stick to it for help.

No matter how powerful the expeditionary force is, the total force is only that small, not to mention that they are all cavalry, so it is impossible to fight a tough battle.

The enemy gave an opportunity, and Hudson naturally had to seize it. The benefits of taking prisoners are reflected at this moment. Many coalition soldiers chose to surrender when there was nothing they could do.

The number of prisoners in his hands was too large, forcing Hudson to transfer a legion from the country to guard these prisoners of war with the Mosi people.

In the era of poor information transmission, everyone relies on "reputation" for a living. If no one is sent to watch, who knows how many prisoners will be left in the end after handing them over to the Moxi people.

The coach has to take responsibility for what his subordinates do. Accumulating "credibility and word of mouth" is not easy, and Hudson is not willing to put his "golden signature" of doing what he says here.

Being able to fight continuously, in addition to the fact that the expeditionary force is all elites, the "Ha's Magic Potion" also contributed a lot.

Under normal circumstances, the horses are the most injured when the cavalry raids long distances and fights continuously.

But this time is different. The war horse that took the magic potion is still in good spirits after completing the long-distance raid.

Only when the physical strength of the war horse can keep up, can the follow-up expansion of the victory be smooth. If it weren't for the insufficient strength of the expeditionary force, the record would have been even more prominent.

As for the defenders of Fort Augustus, they were naturally left to deal with the corpses. After a bitter battle, the surviving officers and soldiers were severely injured physically and mentally, and urgently needed recovery and adjustment.

Five days later, standing under the former steel defense line of the Warhammer Kingdom, Hudson complained helplessly: If you don't die, you won't die.

It used to be the forefront of the Warhammer Kingdom's resistance to the orc invasion, and once prevented hundreds of thousands of orc troops from advancing, but now only weeds and rubble are left on the ground.

During the war years, unfortunately meeting a prodigal king can really kill a country.

The main reason is that I have lived a comfortable and comfortable life for too long, forgetting that the essence of the world is that the weak eat the strong.

In order to maintain the royal power, there is no problem with the balance of the game, but the prerequisite is that the two sides can balance.

In a sense, Hudson was also a beneficiary of the failure of Joseph II's balance policy.

The lessons learned from the past were there, and everyone was frightened, so that after the outbreak of the mainland war, all the major forces in the kingdom pushed him out to preside over the overall situation.

balance?

Anyone with a little bit of military common sense can see that the Alpha Kingdom has a very low probability of winning if it concentrates all its forces; if the army is divided into two, then the battle will be impossible.

"Send the order, the whole army stops pursuing!"

Hudson ordered decisively.

During yesterday's pursuit, no more than 200 enemy soldiers were killed, and only more than 300 prisoners were captured.

From the five-digit daily record at the beginning to the three-digit record now, the results are getting more and more unremarkable.

It's not that the soldiers didn't work hard, it's mainly because after a few days of fleeing, the defeated soldiers had long gone to nowhere.

The best time to expand the results of the battle has passed, and there will be little gain if you continue to hunt down. On the contrary, it is possible to be ambushed by the enemy because of the dispersion of troops.

Rather than deal with each race one by one, Hudson would rather wait for the alien races to get together before sending troops to attack.

"1+1" may be greater than 2, but "1+1+1" will be less than 3. The more races gathered together, the more internal problems.

Internal friction will always be the number one enemy of the "Alliance", and Hudson believes in the destructive power brought by pig teammates.

This war has already planted the seeds of differences. Also encountered a surprise attack, some races were wiped out, some races were seriously injured, and some races retreated completely.

The race that retreated completely was the first to run away; the race that was completely wiped out reacted a step slower and passively blocked the allies.

Don't suffer from scarcity but unevenness. Seeing that their own family has suffered heavy losses, but their allies are unscathed, anyone's heart will be unbalanced!

Just as Hudson guessed, the alliance of the ancient survivors, thousands of miles away, is in a mess at the moment.

Since receiving the news, all parties have been arguing non-stop. When a battle is lost, someone has to be responsible for it. In particular, it is necessary to give the elves an explanation for leaving the elf magician group on the battlefield with unknown life and death.

"enough!

Things are so obvious, why bother. If there is a big defeat on the front line, someone must have become a deserter. If everyone fights to the end like my giant family, the ending will definitely be different!

In order to prevent similar incidents from happening in the future, those who escaped first must be arrested, and the military law is used to deter the entire army! "

The giant king took the lead in making trouble.

As a big race, their size is the guiding light on the battlefield. Other races can sneak away, but they can't!

There were already few people, but now the entire army of one thousand giants on the front line has been wiped out, making the giant family even worse.

All the members of my family were killed in battle, but some allies withdrew the troops in an organized way. After a little speculation, I knew that they were betrayed by teammates.

"The giant king calm down, we can't jump to conclusions until the matter is investigated clearly.

Whether there are any deserters from various ethnic groups in the alliance will be discussed after the parties are found. No one is here, if you make a mistake, wouldn't it be chilling for the people! "

The macaque king persuaded.

From the bottom of his heart, he didn't want to be this early bird. After all, the giant king's fists and violent temper are well-known in the alliance of the ancient survivors.

Despite the news from the front line, the macaque family was also the first to evacuate. Whether it was the first to run away or one of the first races to run away is still unknown.

If the giant king's proposal is followed, the army of the macaque tribe will definitely be held accountable, and there is a high probability that they will be listed as negative models and severely punished.

It was difficult to withdraw from the front line and preserve the strength of the race. How could these younger brothers die in the hands of "our own people".

Direct opposition is not enough, so just delay. Anyway, the army is on the front line, and the alliance will not be able to reach it for a while.

Find an opportunity later, let them sneak back to the clan area secretly, and declare their death in battle.

"Hang Xin, what's so chilling?

Even if the battle situation is unfavorable, a strategic shift must be carried out, at least the magician group must be brought along!

Abandoning the magician group and fleeing alone, this is the first time I have encountered such an anecdote through the ages.

Could it be that some people think that the elf magician group is not their own anyway, so it's okay to lose it, right? "

The giant king said mockingly.

To fight against the human race, the Alliance of Ancient Remnants must rely on the power of the elves. If it weren't for the joining of the Elven Mage Group, maybe they are still entangled with the Eastern and Western Warhammer Kingdoms.

In order to escape for his own life, he lost the magician group aided by his allies, and he obviously couldn't explain it.

The dead don't need to take responsibility, and they don't have the ability to take responsibility, so the blame can only be borne by the living.

The elves are not easy to mess with. Everyone relies on the power of the alliance to be qualified to talk to the elves, but it doesn't mean that everyone is the same race.

In the case of offending the human race, and then offending the elves, it is obvious that they are not going to mess around on the continent of Aslante.

Seeing that the atmosphere in the room was becoming more and more tense, the Multiclaw King on the side smoothed things over and said, "Okay, both of you.

The front line is too chaotic, and the news we receive may not be accurate.

The elf magician group broke out, but they were only temporarily out of contact with us, and it may not be impossible. Might as well wait until the rout is gathered before discussing these issues.

The top priority is still the frontline battle situation. The army of the Eastern Expedition was defeated, and the coalition forces of the Alphas and the Mossi may march straight in at any time.

At present, the Warhammer Kingdom of the West is still relying on the mountainous terrain to carry out the final stubborn resistance; within the Kingdom of the Eastern Warhammer, there are also several rebel forces, large and small.

Once the human army comes back and unites with these armed forces, it will definitely pose a serious threat to our local rule. "

This is an embarrassing question. The lands of the Eastern and Western Warhammer Kingdoms have been divided into their own spheres of influence.

According to the prior agreement, whoever's troubles will be solved. The progress ahead was so smooth that everyone didn't take the scattered resistance forces seriously.

Now that the human army is about to come over, everything will be different. If the enemy cannot be kept out of the door, there will be endless troubles.

The East and West Warhammer Kingdoms are in turmoil, and the army sent to attack the Principality of Orton will be in danger. In case of being cut off by the human army, it might be another big defeat.

Confidence is so mysterious. When they were making great strides before, everyone didn't pay attention to the human race at all.

Having just experienced a big defeat, it immediately reminded them that the human race is the overlord of the continent of Aslante.

"If there is anything to discuss, hurry up and organize the army to reinforce the front line. The East and West Warhammer Kingdoms were brought down by us, and we must never fall into the hands of the human race.

Anyway, I have had enough of the days of ice and snow. If we are driven back this time, I am afraid we will have to continue migrating to the depths of the ice and snow world.

If the human race gets ruthless, it is not impossible to directly exterminate us.

Everyone chose to come out to gamble on the luck of the clan at this moment, and they thought it was because they saw the current situation in the mainland.

The alliance wins, we still have a chance to breathe; if the human race wins again, all races in the mainland will face the test of life and death.

As for the elves, let's do the posture first. Now is the time to use troops. For the sake of the overall situation, they should give us a chance to perform. "

The Shadow King's words brought everyone back to reality. Things have already happened, and shirking responsibility will not solve any problems.

No matter how you say it, you have to go through this hurdle first. As for the further intensification of conflicts within the alliance, everyone has seen it, but there is nothing they can do about it.

Under the multi-ethnic alliance system, it is okay to fight with the wind. If there is a big rout, the scene of Fort Augustus will continue to repeat itself.

It is meaningless to talk about the overall situation. For small races, the first thing to think about is to continue the racial inheritance.

Driven by this kind of thinking, when they make decisions, they have to choose to give priority to preserving their own strength.

…

In the Principality of Cantero, after a series of defeats, the elves have besieged the city.

It was about to take down the royal city, and let the world know how powerful the elves army is, but at this time, they received the bad news of the defeat of their allies.

"What happened on the Eastern Front, what kind of battle are those idiots from the Alliance of Ancient Remnants fighting?"

The Forest Elf Queen asked in a daze.

Just a few days ago, she received the news that the coalition forces of the ancient survivors had the absolute upper hand, and the defense line of Fort Augustus was just around the corner.

Never expected that the turning point would come so quickly. A little carelessness can turn a big victory into a big defeat.

"Queen, the Alpha Kingdom has dispatched troops. According to the news from the front line, Marshal Hudson of the Alpha Kingdom personally led an army of 100,000 troops and rushed two hundred miles to launch a night attack on the Allied Forces of the Ancient Remnants.

At that time, the allied forces of the ancient survivors had just entered the fortress of Fort Augustus, and the main force was fighting fiercely in the city.

By the time they reacted, the camp had already fallen into the hands of the enemy. He could only retreat from the city in a hurry to meet the enemy, but he was defeated miserably!

The magician group we sent to support the Alliance of Ancient Remnants also ran out of magic power due to previous battles and fell into the hands of the enemy. It is currently unknown whether they are alive or dead. "

As soon as the old man finished speaking, the elf queen's face turned green with anger. It's okay for the allies to lose the battle, but even the reinforcements they sent out were trapped.

That is a group of magicians. There are more than twenty eighth-level magicians in it, and even the weakest one is a fifth-level magician.

Sending this carefully selected team, in addition to providing support to allies, also means showing off force.

I thought that the magician group was guarded by a large army, and there was not much danger. This trip was just a tour at public expense, but the reality was too embarrassing.

Chapter 428 Conspiracy Strikes

Two or three more times, or even one more time, the Alliance of Ancient Survivors may be forced to abandon the strategic plan to invade the Principality of Moxi because they cannot bear the casualties.

"Trash!"

"They are all a bunch of trash, they can be attacked even if they attack a city, no wonder they can only linger in the corner of the ice and snow world!

Ancient Remains Alliance, I think it's better to change its name to: Ancient Waste Alliance. They have been passed down to the present, and they are polluting the eyes.

There are also those ignorant orcs who know how to entangle with the countries on the prairie all day long, and forget who their real enemies are.

Everyone is worried, I really don't know how they passed down from ancient times..."

Pius VII roared and greeted the three major alien races in the Northern Continent all over, without even caring about his image.

"Your Majesty, judging from the current situation, I'm afraid it's not these alien wastes, but they didn't expect Hudson to be so powerful.

Recalling the series of boring losses he suffered during his dealings with Hudson, he still can't let go of it.

Seeing Hudson, the enemy, killing all directions, he felt both uncomfortable and relieved.

The inside and outside of the words reveal everything, it is really not his master Blake who is rubbish, but the enemy is too powerful.

Compared to the aliens who suffered heavy losses, when he clashed with Hudson on the prairie battlefield, he only lost part of the right to speak, which is already considered very good.

Having been a man with his tail between his legs for several years, now that he has a foreign background, Blake naturally wants to clear his name.

"Hudson is indeed a threat. It's just that this person is guarded by giant dragons and earth bears. It may be difficult to get rid of him.

If the Alpha Kingdom is destroyed in the continental war, then everything will be over; if they are still strong, we can't let them go.

To defeat a kingdom, it is far easier to start from the inside than to attack head-on. The master is weak and the minister is strong, which is the way to seek disaster.

The number one **** of war in the mainland, the number one powerhouse in the mainland, the number one in the mainland...

You guys look at the compilation, and give me all the hats that can be put on his head.

Remember, this time we only publicize his merits, and it must be carried out subtly, so that the outside world cannot find out that we are behind the scenes. "

Pius VII said with a sneer.

Once there is a conflict between the two sides, no matter who wins or loses, it will weaken the national strength of the Alpha Kingdom.

In order to achieve his goal, Pius VII was not even prepared to take the title of "the most powerful man in the mainland".

Fame wears on.

The name of the strongest person in the mainland can not only bring fame, but also bring trouble.

The status is there, and many times it is impossible to shirk it.

Missing two inherited artifacts, he is just a **** meat shield, and his real combat power is far inferior to that of several dragon knights.

If one day a strong iron man emerges and wants to challenge him, the number one power in the pseudo-continent, it will be embarrassing.

"Your Majesty, wise!

Listening to the flattery of all his subordinates, Pius VII couldn't help but smile slightly. When it comes to manipulating people's hearts, he is a professional.

…

Fort Augustus, the **** scene has been washed away. Only the collapsed city walls and the remnants everywhere tell the cruelty of the war.

The defenders who survived the catastrophe became fierce after experiencing the test of life and death. Wherever you stand, the surrounding temperature will drop.

Ended the expansion of the results, and the expeditionary force was also withdrawn by Hudson to rest.

Excellent hunters never lack patience. They will only shoot a critical arrow at a critical moment.

"Marshal, something is wrong!"

"Last night, the elves broke into the capital of the Duke of Kantruh, and all the high-level officials of the Principality, including the king, were unfortunately killed.

The Principality of Ustad and the Principality of Fick issued a strong warning. If no reinforcements appeared, they would surrender to the elves! "

Raquel said in a panic.

The current situation is very obvious. The destruction of the Principality of Kantruo has frightened the senior officials of the Principality of Ustad and the Principality of Fick.

At the critical moment of life and death, the high-level leaders of the two countries, who could not see any hope, did not hesitate to threaten surrender.

Once the barriers of the three principalities disappear, the army of the elves can meet with the coalition forces of the ancient survivors at any time. The two great alien races teamed up, and no one can bear it!

Hearing the news, Hudson also hesitated. After finally gaining a little strategic initiative on the battlefield, how do you want to give it up?

Vaguely, he realized that it was his fault. So far in the war, the large-scale acceptance of prisoners has only occurred at the Battle of Augustsburg.

The Principality of Ustad and the Principality of Fick dared to threaten to surrender. Obviously, the elves sent them a signal to surrender and made certain promises.

If the other side doesn't keep any prisoners, then it's a ghost to surrender. You must fight to the death!

"Raquel, immediately send someone to inform the capital and ask them to strengthen intelligence gathering on the elf army, especially to confirm whether they are now carrying out large-scale genocide!"

Everything stays on the line, and we will meet again in the future. If the elves really change their way of playing in the continental hegemony, the countries in the northern continent may not even have room to struggle.

To fight to the end is to be forced and helpless, but if there is a chance of life, how many people are willing to die?

Perhaps some nobles may choose to fight to the end for glory. But more people will shrink back in the face of life and death.

Intuition told Hudson that the probability of such a thing happening was very high.

The elves are not a race that likes to kill. If they are allowed to slaughter all the way, I am afraid that the mentality of many elves will collapse.

Knowing this, Hudson is not going to continue to be silent. If you don't have a fighter, create one yourself.

The coalition forces of the ancient survivors are gathering. If they take the initiative to attack and kill the troops of several tribes, it is still very possible.

"Crossing the Warhammer Kingdom, directly entering the lairs of various races in the ice and snow world, forcing them to return to aid."

As soon as this idea was born, Hudson dismissed it. In this season of ice and snow world, many areas have already started to snow.

Cultivators are indeed more frost-resistant, but lacking logistical supplies, it is also risky to break into other people's lairs directly.

There is no such precedent in the continent of Aslant, but there are so many negative teaching materials in the previous life, Hudson knows how terrible the power of cold winter is.

"Marshal, there is no need to investigate specifically. The elf army did not slaughter wantonly, they only killed all the young and old, and then drove away the old, weak, women and children in the controlled area.

Taking the principality as an example, in order to guarantee the basic needs of the refugees in the territory, at least thousands of tons of food and supplies must be paid every day.

This is because a large number of refugees died on the road, otherwise the consumption would be even greater.

The principality simply cannot afford the huge consumption of materials. The topic of whether to rescue refugees has been debated endlessly at the top.

Until you stepped in and promised to open restrictions on accepting refugees, the situation improved slightly.

Now that the Principality of Cantrue is destroyed, the number of refugees will increase sharply in the future. I am afraid that it will be difficult in the future. "

Lackel's explanation brought Hudson back to reality, and then he took a deep breath.

The elf army's approach seems to be better than massacres, but in fact the hidden purpose is more vicious.

Not to mention those who died on the road, they were all refugees made up of the old, the weak, women and children. In the war years when supplies were scarce, that was a proper burden.

Accepting refugees consumes a lot of supplies; leaving them alone will harm the place. Once a person's stomach is extremely hungry, no moral bottom line will exist.

At this moment, Hudson understood why the Moxi people agreed when he asked for refugees.

In times of war, the least valuable thing is human life. Fortunately, the definition of "old" in the continent of Aslant is different, otherwise there would be no males in the refugee ranks.

With a sick population ratio, Hudson doesn't know what to do next. Perhaps the "European romance" in the previous life was caused by the aftermath of the war.

"Since this is the case, there is no need to waste time. Raquel, immediately arrange for someone to prepare dry food and fodder.

The dry food is mainly dried meat and cheese. Prepare half a pound of salt for each person, and if possible, prepare some sugar.

Forage must be high-quality fine material..."

Hudson immediately ordered.

Since it was a long-distance raid, the expeditionary force naturally did not carry much supplies. Now that he has arrived in the Principality of Moxi, the logistical supplies will naturally be provided by the Moxi people.

Elite troops must receive elite treatment. On the continent of Aslant, where productivity is lagging behind, logistical supplies also appear monotonous.

Especially "sugar" has become a luxury.

Affected by the backward production technology, the production of sugar in Aslante Continent is extremely limited, and the price is more expensive than gold, which is usually reserved for nobles.

Letting sugar enter the army as a strategic material was first proposed by Hudson.

Can Kingdom's sugar production is too low, and the annual production of 3,000 pounds in the Mountain Territory accounts for one-tenth of the Alpha Kingdom.

It's not that Hudson doesn't work hard, it's really that the sugar making process is not good enough. Where is the total output stuck? Even if the food is taken from the mouth of the nobles, it is not enough for the soldiers to share.

"Marshal, other materials are easy to talk about. Even if you put together things, you can get them out, but sugar...

If you report to the capital, you may be able to scrape together a hundred and eighty pounds. In the frontline army, it is really..."

Chapter 432:
The King Chapter 432: Warcraft Legion's debut

Chapter 432 The first show of the Warcraft Legion

After the rain, Kaveh led a group of giants lazily basking in the sun.

"Kaveh, don't go to sleep.

Looking at the size, you can tell that giants must be big eaters. If the nutrition can't keep up, I can't grow such a big man.

Do not engage in agricultural production, but rely entirely on hunting for a living. The backward production mode determines that the giants can only live in small tribes.

"Pamela, what are you talking about?

No food, impossible!

So many carts of food, how could it be gone so quickly? Could it be that you have withheld our military rations? "

For a long-starved race, food is life.

"What the hell!

Why food is consumed so quickly, don't you know?

The food intake of Kaweihe alone is dozens of times that of mine. With more of you big stomach kings, can food consumption not be fast! "

As the leader of the giant army, Kavehe's size is also outstanding among the giants, and the corresponding food demand is also greater.

The consumption of ordinary giants is relatively small, which is only relative to him. Compared with soldiers of other races, they are still big eaters.

Before the outbreak of the Continental War, giants starved every now and then. After finally having the opportunity to open their stomachs to eat, everyone will naturally not keep it.

Giants need to use pots for cooking, and a meal of dozens of pounds of food is easy.

When encountering such a group of big eaters, food consumption will naturally not be slowed down.

In addition, this time they came out to reinforce the coalition forces in the province of Deklas. If there was no rainy season, they would have arrived at their destination by now.

Maybe because he knew he was wrong, Kavehe suddenly became embarrassed, and said hesitantly: "The next meal is a big deal. I will eat less, but we can't deduct our military rations!"

Hearing this answer, the generals of various ethnic groups who came together had black lines on their foreheads.

Sure enough, discussing with the big guy is a waste of time.

If it weren't for the fact that there are more than 800 giants in the reinforcements this time, but with a proper combat power, everyone would be too lazy to talk to him.

"Okay, no one will deduct your military rations, but in order to make up for the lack of supplies, we must take a military action.

On the way here, we found traces of armed resistance activities nearby, there should be…”

Before Pamela finished speaking, the ground suddenly shook, as if an earthquake had erupted.

"Enemy attack!"

As soon as the spies sent back the information, a large army appeared in the sky, and it was before everyone's eyes in a blink of an eye.

The speed of the enemy's arrival is really too fast, faster than the horse scouts arranged by everyone.

"Arrange to meet the enemy!"

Pamela hastily ordered.

A group of commanders returned to their camp one after another, organized the army to prepare for the battle, and the whole camp was chaotic.

The giants outside the camp are the most miserable, and they are about to be caught between the two sides.

Glancing at the murderous monster cavalry in front of him, Kavehe said decisively: "What are you doing in a daze, get out of here!"

Without the giant human shield, the camp was suddenly exposed to the expeditionary force, making Hudson wonder if it was an enemy conspiracy.

However, the big camp ahead has neither a horse trap nor a horse rejection post, and it is completely undefended.

With such a large capital, it would be too generous to play conspiracy.

Looking at the hurriedly lined up enemy troops, Hudson smiled disdainfully, and immediately ordered:

"The magic crossbow shoots freely, rushing into the camp to defeat the enemy!"

He finally understood that the enemy army was tricked by "our own people".

Originally there were giants guarding the periphery, even if they encountered enemy attacks, there was enough time to gather troops.

The plan couldn't keep up with the changes. The giant guarding the gate of the camp was frightened by the army of monsters and stepped aside to open the gate.

"whoosh, whoosh, whoosh..."

The sound of crossbow arrows piercing through the air directly pierced the camp. The coalition soldiers standing in front were killed and injured in an instant.

"Counterattack!

Archers counterattack quickly! "

Pamela roared.

It's a pity that everything is in vain. The archer and the magic crossbow shoot at each other. The gap between the two sides is an era.

Countless well-trained archers fell directly under the random shots of the magic crossbow.

Before the towering archery tower had time to display its power, it was slapped down by Bear Stearns.

Just as the magicians in the camp were about to make a move, Maxim's spit out a big fireball and swept towards them, scaring everyone to dodge.

Those who survived the catastrophe were still in shock, and the unlucky ones who reacted a little slower turned into people on fire with only one scream left behind.

The big fireball seemed to have life, and it didn't go out immediately. Instead, it rolled towards the depths of the camp. The tents, food and grass along the way were burned.

One of the few masters in the coalition forces wanted to come out to intercept, but was immediately shot by Hudson.

Before he set off on the expedition, he made a special trip to the Arcane Academy and asked those old antiques to help him build a magic bow.

There are few wood-type monsters, let alone seventh-level monsters. If it is in the hands of others, this is a tasteless magic weapon.

Of course, wood magicians of the eighth level and above can also drive, but they are almost sucked dry after releasing an arrow, and the power is similar to that of their full-strength release of magic.

It is one thing to be able to drive, but it is another thing to be able to draw the bow and hit the target.

There are quite a few people who cultivate both magic and martial arts, but almost none of them have achieved higher results at the same time. Human energy is limited, so we must make choices in cultivation.

A few arrows of "whoosh, whoosh, whoosh..." were shot, reminding the foreign race that Master Hudson also has the reputation of "Knight of the Bow".

The strong are not easy to kill. Except for the initial sneak attack, most of the rest are only scratched.

It made Hudson very depressed, and he had to sigh that giants are easy to kill, and that kind of big guy can aim at every target.

In the blink of an eye, the army had rushed into the camp, and the coalition forces fighting on their own suffered a big loss immediately.

As neighbors of giants, the multi-clawed tribe suffered the worst.

Looking at the chaotic camp, Pamela was about to greet the eighteenth generation of Kavehe's ancestors, when she was swept by a dragon's tail.

Then the scene completely got out of control, and the multi-claw soldiers who lost their command wanted their parents to have two more legs and fled in all directions.

A large number of routs rushed to the rear, directly disrupting the formation of the rear army, and before they could react, the enemy had already killed them.

Rout, hit the rear camp again; Rout again, hit again...

The continued behavior of pig teammates made the expeditionary force, which was at a disadvantage in terms of strength, gain an advantage in strength when fighting.

The coalition camp that stretched for seven or eight miles became a mess. The race, unable to bear the pressure, left the camp involuntarily.

…

"Brother, we seem to have gotten into trouble?"

Hearing the question from the giant beside him, Kaveh slapped him on the back of the head, and said angrily:

"Aren't you talking nonsense!"

It can be seen that they are experienced in such things as causing trouble.

It's just that the situation is a little different this time, and it seems that the allies have been miserable.

But thinking of the last time in Fort Augustus, the entire army of his own army was wiped out, and Kaveh felt a little bit more confident.

"Brother, what should we do now?"

The little brother who had been slapped stretched out his hand and rubbed the back of his head, as if nothing happened, and continued to ask.

Obviously, it wasn't the first time he was beaten, he was used to it.

Teaching the younger brother can be done at any time, but dealing with the aftermath is a big problem.

Bringing the troops over to help, it seems that the risk is a bit high, and it may accidentally injure one's own people.

"Second brother, how about we go around and attack the enemy back and forth?"

Kaveh said uncertainly.

He fights often, but this is the first time he fights.

They were all reinforcements drawn from the rear. The biggest scene they experienced was a group of 180 giants fighting in groups, or hunting a large monster.

"Inappropriate!

Wang said that you need to use your brains in battle, and you can't charge stupidly.

You see there are deserters, and the alliance has deserters—kill!

Otherwise, we can persuade the deserters to go back, so as to save them from losing their heads, which can be regarded as helping our allies. "

After a little hesitation, Kaveh still nodded.

Although I don't know what I should do now, I have to try my best to make up for my mistakes, and I can't just stay where I am.

…

Leading the team all the way through the camp, Hudson discovered that something was wrong, and brought the enemy troops who should have fled in all directions together again.

If the scene wasn't too chaotic, he would have suspected that the enemy army had a general, and gathered his troops to counterattack.

Anyway, the scene was very tense. At one point, Hudson suspected that the enemy army had a unified command, and the giant was a supervisory team sent by the enemy's coach.

It doesn't matter what the truth is. The key is that the enemy army was blocked in the camp and did not flee in all directions. This is very different from his plan.

Rabbits bite people when they are in a hurry, let alone a coalition of 50,000 ancient survivors.

The expeditionary army was able to kill all directions. On the one hand, the combat effectiveness of the monster cavalry was really strong, and on the other hand, it caught the opponent by surprise.

The heavy rain for seven consecutive days has already made the coalition forces lower their vigilance. Even the soldiers sent out on patrol only wandered around for a few miles.

When the expeditionary army was discovered, the distance between the two sides was only a few miles. The information was passed back, and the monster cavalry also rushed to the camp.

Many soldiers were forced to take up arms to meet the enemy before they had time to put on their armor, and tragedy became inevitable.

But no matter what, that was 50,000 enemy troops, fully ten times the strength of the Warcraft Legion, and they could still bring a lot of casualties to the expeditionary army.

"Put down your weapons, surrender without killing!"

Hudson spoke in the lingua franca of the continent.

Under the blessing of amplification magic, the sound was transmitted to the ears of all soldiers on the battlefield.

Although many foreign soldiers did not understand what he said, they could roughly tell from the expressions of their own officers.

"boom!"

The sound of weapons falling broke the silence. As soon as the first soldier who could not bear the pressure lowered his weapon, the wave of surrender began to spread rapidly.

Realizing that something was wrong, Kaveh immediately shouted: "These **** traitors dare to surrender to the enemy!

What are you still doing in a daze, run away! "

When the voice fell to the ground, Kavehe had turned and left, followed by all the giants.

Since the entire army was annihilated last time, the giant king has specifically instructed that if you can't win, you should focus on preserving your own strength.

Kaveh undoubtedly fulfilled his boss's instructions and ran at the forefront of the team with an unscathed army.

Seeing this scene, several foreign generals who were confronting Kaveh almost vomited blood.

If it weren't for the huge gap between the giants and the human race, they would have suspected that these guys were traitors planted by the enemy, and they would do a lot of tricks on their teammates.

The road is out of the way, so there is no need to fight the enemy to the end. As for surrender, that is the last option.

Watching the enemy leave the camp, Hudson slowly ordered the pursuit. Compared with fighting on the frontal battlefield, the pursuit after a defeat is the easiest time to achieve results.

Quickly hit hard, completely unnecessary. Hanging the enemy like this is the best choice.

Even the enemy's air force went out to ask for help, he didn't stop him, and now he would not be in a hurry to annihilate the enemy.

…

Declas Province, affected by the flash floods, the coalition forces were forced to move, and the camp is still in chaos at the moment.

…”

As far as the current camp is, it is crowded with tents connected to tents. If it is attacked by enemy fire, the camp will be reduced to ashes in an instant! "

"And, still stubborn..."

…

There are more races and more right and wrong, similar bickering activities are commonplace in the alliance.

Facts have proved that it is entirely feasible to use external enemies to divert internal conflicts.

Now everyone is counting on using the great enemy of the human race to ease the internal conflicts among the various races in the alliance.

…
