It was like the wind when it came, but it turned into a snail when it went back. It's not that the quality of the expeditionary force has declined, it's mainly because there are too many spoils.

Not many things were seized directly, but there were not many gifts received. Hudson didn't eat alone, it was a military practice to share the profits.

In order to transport the trophies, everyone's poor horses are now pulling carts. Not only did the cavalry become infantry, but they also had to work part-time as civilian husbands.

Transport your own loot, no matter how hard or tiring it is, no one complains. Everyone has a lot of big and small bags, and on the surface it seems that the harvest is similar.

The difference lies in the value. The more outstanding the military exploits, the higher the value of the spoils.

The trophies of officers and soldiers at the bottom are mostly practical. Cloth, salt, tea, gold coins...

Obviously, Hudson also worked **** the distribution of spoils. In the case of meeting actual needs, be as fair and equitable as possible.

"Marshal, urgent report on the northern line!"

Received the battle report, glanced at it roughly, and Hudson said blankly: "Got it."

He was startled, thinking that something big happened, but he didn't expect that he had lost a line of defense.

The line of defense created by temporary rush work is not bad if it can be used, what else can I ask for.

If you lose it, you will lose it. From the northern border to the southern border, the kingdom still has countless lines of defense.

The orc empire in its heyday had no way to break through the kingdom's defenses in a short period of time, let alone now.

The rich experience of being beaten allows the Kingdom's army to always preserve its vitality to the greatest extent when the line of defense is lost.

Data don't lie. A line of defense held back the orc army for more than a month, losing 40,000 troops, which Hudson could fully accept.

Of course, there is serious water in these figures. It is said that the enemy army was delayed for more than a month, and the time for the enemy to actually launch an attack must be much shorter.

Hudson is sure that the orcs have no idea at the moment, but if they want to keep the newly recovered prairie, they have to continue this war.

According to his original vision, the orc empire would invade the kingdom with all its strength, and the newly recovered provinces in northern Xinjiang would all fall, placing the battlefield on the territories of the five northern dukes.

This is not to cheat teammates, but the five dukes are often beaten, they are the most experienced in facing the orc invasion, and the fortifications in the territory are also the most complete.

In contrast, the newly recovered provinces are not good enough. The development time is too short, the infrastructure is not perfect, and the battlefield is placed there, and logistics is a big problem.

If it weren't for Hudson's quick victory on the western front, the pressure of the two fronts was superimposed, and the kingdom would not last long at all.

The army moved forward slowly, as if it was completely unaffected by the defeat in Northern Xinjiang. It's just that Hudson can sit, but it doesn't mean that all the northern Xinjiang nobles can also sit.

Different from ordinary human countries, the Alpha Kingdom's handling of lords' lost cities and lands is extremely strict.

In the previous orc invasions, countless noble lords died on the battlefield, not because they couldn't run, but because they couldn't run.

The killing of the orcs is a test of life and death for the noble lords in the border areas.

In the Emerald Palace, Caesar IV was in a state of sorrow and joy. He had just received the good news of the truce on the western front, and a letter of plea for help from northern Xinjiang came to him like snowflakes.

"The Expeditionary Army, how long will it take to reach the capital?"

Caesar IV asked concerned.

"Expeditionary Army", this special army, has placed high hopes on the kingdom since its birth.

Facts have proved that the Kingdom made the right move. Relying on the high mobility of the elite cavalry, they quickly defeated the alliance of the ancient survivors, deterred the elves, and laid the foundation for the signing of the non-aggression treaty.

These are only direct impacts, causing even greater indirect impacts. After the Warhammer Battle of the Great Plains, the countries' judgment on the strength of the Alpha Kingdom was once again invisibly elevated.

Originally due to the serious injury after the war, the international status that fell, suddenly came back.

"Heroes" are always vulnerable to special attention. In particular, the expeditionary army was assembled from private armies of various families, and the royal family was the main force among them.

Nearly 30% of the officers and soldiers in the expeditionary force came from the royal family. It can be said that the elite children of the younger generation of the royal family are basically stuffed in.

The situation of each family is similar. They have sent their best children to experience it, and learn how Hudson uses soldiers by the way.

Compared to the illustrious military achievements of the expeditionary army, they actually cared more about the safety of their own children.

In the battle report issued by Hudson earlier, there was only one death toll, and the identity of the deceased was not introduced in detail.

"Your Majesty, according to the current speed of the expeditionary force, it will take about ten days to reach the capital.

Look, do you want to urge them to speed up? "

Archduke Afiero asked tentatively.

The news that the expeditionary army has gained a lot is no secret in the capital.

My own children are also in the army, and there is a high probability that they are also one of the vested interests. Naturally, no one will criticize this.

Including the slow marching speed, it is also acquiesced by everyone. What's more, after such a long period of high-intensity combat, it's time for the expeditionary force to rest and reorganize, and they can't waste the elite just because they are on their way.

"Forget it, they have a lot of luggage, so the marching speed should be slower, just slower!"

Caesar IV waved his hand and said.

When they came back, their speed was less than half of the speed when they went out. The expeditionary force can be regarded as setting a record, which is completely contrary to the normal march of "returning like an arrow".

Caesar IV was able to not panic because it was time to reap the fruits of victory on the Western Front, and it was not unacceptable to temporarily lose the sparsely populated poor provinces in the north.

It is not the same as other great nobles, and they can bear it. In addition to letters of appeal for help, it is inevitable to start public relations in the capital.

"Your Majesty, there is no need to worry about the issue of rewards for the expeditionary army. But the situation in northern Xinjiang is imminent. Since the war broke out, we have fallen to thirteen counties, and many strategic locations have been threatened.

The Earls of Oran, Albert, Doug, and Forbes in the border area...all sent urgent letters for help.

The commander-in-chief of the front line, Marquis James, also sent a letter for help, claiming that the defense line deployed by the Kingdom in the border area is far from meeting the needs of the war.

According to his estimation, if there is no more reinforcements to join the battle, in the next three to six months, the kingdom will lose the seven northern provinces again. "

The prime minister, the Grand Duke of Newfoundland, said solemnly.

Purely from an economic point of view, the seven provinces in northern Xinjiang have made a direct negative contribution to the kingdom, and the central government has to allocate funds for relief every year.

But the accounts are not calculated that way. The Alpha Kingdom has a total of more than 30 provinces, and losing seven provinces at once, no one can afford the political impact.

If such a tragedy really happened, then the emerging aristocratic group that had just risen would definitely suffer a devastating blow.

The political structure of the kingdom will definitely be impacted. The old aristocrat's right to speak has been further strengthened, and Hudson is the only one left among the emerging aristocrats.

There is no problem with self-protection. If you want him to balance the power of the old nobles alone, then there is no need to fantasize. It is even more likely to jump ship directly and join the old noble camp.

Anyway, the internal camp confrontation in the Alpha Kingdom is not that sharp, and the boundaries between the old and new aristocratic groups have always been blurred.

The Koslow family has also been inherited for thousands of years, and Hudson has made up for the shortcomings of the inheritance. As long as you have a thicker skin, you can also join the circle.

"Is the whole country mobilized?"

Caesar IV asked uncertainly.

Every time the orcs invade in an all-round way, the Alpha Kingdom will mobilize the whole country. It stands to reason that this time will be no exception, but the reality does not allow it.

The strategic materials raised by the kingdom at the moment are far less than in previous wars. If there is a nationwide mobilization, the biggest problem is how to solve the logistics of the army.

The newly recovered seven provinces in northern Xinjiang are all poor. The local industrial economy is almost zero, and the food production is difficult to support themselves.

Don't say that it is to provide food and supplies for the army, it is not bad if it is not hindered. Maybe the kingdom will have to take out valuable strategic materials to rescue the refugees caused by the war.

"Your Majesty, absolutely not!

The current situation has not reached that point yet, and the national mobilization has too much influence, so it can only be the last choice.

Because of this war, in the past month, the kingdom has added another 3.86 million gold coins to its budget deficit.

Lack of money can still find a way, but strategic materials cannot be changed. There are wars everywhere now, and it is difficult to buy enough strategic materials even if you have money.

We have done our best to raise supplies. The material consumption of the more than 500,000 troops on the front line alone drove the whole kingdom to go crazy. "

Finance Minister Marquis Delgado cried bitterly.

Among the high positions in the Alpha Kingdom, the most difficult one is the Ministry of Finance. It seems to have a high position and weight, but it is actually a mess.

Either filling the hole, or trying to find a way to fill the hole. From home to abroad, their creditors are everywhere.

Whenever the night was quiet, the bald Marquis Delgado wanted to let the finances go bankrupt instead of just putting it to pieces.

However, this kind of thing that has been infamous for thousands of years can only be thought about in the end. If you really want to go bankrupt, you can't appear in your own hands.

Among the ministers of the kingdom, Marquis Delgado submitted the most letters of resignation. The resignation letters contributed by one person exceed the sum of the heads of various government departments.

When Caesar IV succeeded to the throne, he once wanted to replace this preoccupied old man, but after gaining a deep understanding of the kingdom's finances, he finally dismissed this dangerous idea.

In any case, Marquis Delgado was able to close the gap without causing financial collapse.

If you change to someone with poor ability, you might be overwhelmed all of a sudden. This kind of shocking hole, Caesar IV will be scared when he sees it.

"Marquis Delgado is right. Given the current situation in the kingdom, if we really mobilize the whole country, we can only last for more than five months at most.

Especially, the road conditions in these seven provinces are worrying, which increases the logistical pressure. According to the estimates of our Ministry of Military Affairs, maintaining the current strength on the front line is almost the limit.

The best choice now is to let the front line hold on for a while, and then go to the front line to fight the enemy after the expeditionary force finishes resting.

This is also the opinion of Marshal Hudson! "

Grand Duke Afiero echoed.

As the Minister of Military Affairs, he knows the soldiers well. The situation on the front line is indeed dangerous, but it is not time to collapse immediately.

Without the support of the Human Race Alliance, it is a miracle in itself to be able to support 500,000 troops to fight on their own.

"Your Majesty, what the two ministers said is very reasonable, but we have to consider the demands of the frontline nobles.

If we cannot send reinforcements in a short period of time, can we consider replacing with a strong commander? "

As soon as the voice of the Prime Minister, the Grand Duke of Newfoundland, fell to the ground, Caesar IV understood it instantly. Originally, I wondered why these issues were so controversial. The relationship was just acting for him, and the real purpose was to change coaches.

Hudson hasn't even arrived in the capital yet, so he was assigned a new position so quickly. The Marquis James, who needs to be sacrificed, happens to be his confidant.

Objection is impossible. The most powerful people in the court have unified their positions, and the local nobles have also made demands, and the king has no way to stop them.

It's not that everyone doesn't give Marquis James a chance, it's because he can't win the battle! No matter what the reason is, if you lose, you lose.

Compared with a defeated commander, everyone is more willing to believe in Hudson, who beat the orc to doubt his life in the last battle.

Even though the performance of Marquis James was not bad, he was able to keep the main force of the Kingdom's army when the enemy was strong and we were weak, but he couldn't stand the comparison.

"It is a taboo for military strategists to change the commander in the middle of the battle. Moreover, Marshal Hudson has just finished a battle and needs time to adjust and rest.

The expeditionary force that has just returned to China also needs to restore its combat effectiveness, and it is also inseparable from Marshal Hudson.

Otherwise, let Marquis James continue to serve as the commander-in-chief of the front line, and wait for Marshal Hudson to finish handling the affairs of the expeditionary force before taking over the command of the front line. "

Caesar IV strives for Tao.

After working hard for such a long time, he still had to return to zero in the end. His heart was broken. However, his performance on the front line made him lack the confidence to support Marquis James.

Gaining time at this moment is also the last struggle of Caesar IV. If Marquis James can win a big victory on the front line, he can also gain some military say.

After everyone looked at each other, they agreed. It can't be compared with Hudson, but compared to other generals in the kingdom, Marquis James has at least the experience of commanding hundreds of thousands of troops.

During the last war, he followed Hudson as the deputy commander, and after the war, he served as the commander of the standing army. He still has very rich experience in leading troops.

In fact, everyone does not want the Hudson family to dominate. The current embarrassing situation is only due to the lack of candidates to check and balance.
Chapter 447:
The King Chapter 447: Times are different

The release of the non-aggression treaty not only relieved the worries of the Alpha Kingdom, but also released the chains that bound the hands and feet of the elves.

The army of elves, who were not worried about being copied, blew the horn of the Southern Expedition, and the countries along the way immediately ushered in the test of life and death.

Rescue letters were sent out one after another, but the result was: spiritual encouragement from various countries.

Regret is useless. In previous wars, they responded to the frontline countries in this way.

Except for a few countries who send symbolic reinforcements, the rest are just to provide spiritual encouragement to neighboring countries.

Feng Shui takes turns, now it's their turn to enjoy the spiritual support of Dafa, everyone can't take it all at once!

The Human Race Alliance Council held round after round of meetings, and the issue of reinforcements was still not discussed.

The reasons given by each country are more sufficient than the last.

Holy See: We are helping the Ruthenian Kingdom resist the dwarven invasion. We expect to reverse the unfavorable situation on the battlefield within this year, and we will send reinforcements to support it in the coming year.

Frankish Kingdom: We are clearing the half-orc tribe, it will take about half a year to a year, you hold on first.

Kingdom of Hesse: We are busy fighting fiercely with the Stone People, and we can't tell the winner in a short time. We will definitely send troops to support when the battlefield situation improves.

South Shore Kingdom: The Three-Eyed Clan is too powerful, we can only barely resist, and want to send troops to support you, but we have more than enough energy.

Moxi Principality: The previous battle suffered heavy losses. We are defending against the counterattack of the Ancient Remnants Alliance. We hope the Alliance can provide support.

Alpha Kingdom: The northern line of the kingdom has been lost due to the orc invasion. Now we are overwhelmed. Please ask the alliance to support a batch of strategic materials.

…

Busy busy, cry poor cry poor, sell miserable sell miserable. When it came to specific support, no one was willing to contribute.

It's not that countries don't have a big picture, it's just that the elves army is not easy to mess with. Especially the prestige of the elven magician group resounded throughout the mainland.

Forbidden spells flying all over the sky may be a bit exaggerated, but when it comes to the battlefield, it is definitely not justified if you don't get a few forbidden spells.

Unless all countries work together, no single human country can afford such a loss.

Under the current situation, the Frankish Kingdom is the only one that can spare their hands, and the Holy See is at most half. Because they wanted to use the war to pit their teammates, the performance of the Holy See army on the battlefield was a mess.

If the top forces of the two families join forces, it will be no problem to clean up the elves. But the loss that needs to be paid will definitely not be small.

For the sake of a false name, it is obviously not in line with human nature to take out the wealth of the family to fight the elves.

Lutetia Palace, looking at the thick request for help in his hand, Charles III is now very headache. Compared with other countries, the excuse of the Frankish Kingdom is too clumsy after all.

Everyone knew that their war with the orcs was coming to an end, so it was obviously unreasonable to refuse to send troops on this ground.

If the Frankish Kingdom is not the most powerful country on the mainland, and does not have such a large influence in the Human Race Alliance, then it will be done if it is done.

The Holy See, which also has spare power, is not panicking at all now. It doesn't matter if it has a bad reputation on the mainland.

The Frankish Kingdom can't do it. As the leader of the Human Race Alliance, they still have to show some face. Charles III must consider political influence.

The most troublesome thing is that the Frankish Kingdom still has an enclave in the North Continent, which happens to be in the way of the elf army, and the local lord also asked him, the boss, for help.

The obligations of the monarch and his subjects are mutual. While the vassals are loyal to the king, the king must also protect the interests of the vassals.

It is definitely not acceptable to sell the younger brother directly. Once this precedent is established, the loyalty of the nobles to the king will inevitably be affected, and the vassal system of the Frankish Kingdom may be shaken.

Even if you can't keep it, at least you have to make a gesture of doing your best to fulfill the obligation of the monarch.

In terms of overall national strength, the Frankish Kingdom is no weaker than the elves. If there are no other forces, it doesn't matter to directly start an all-out war.

But now the two sides are one south and one north, which belongs to the kind: it is no good to win, and it is a **** game to lose.

To fulfill the obligation of being a monarch, you must send troops for reinforcements. If the number of troops sent is less, that is to send heads; if more troops are sent, the kingdom cannot bear the loss.

"Now that all countries are unwilling to contribute, and it is impossible to talk about organizing coalition forces, what do you think should be done?"

Charles III asked helplessly.

If I knew it was such a hot deal, I shouldn't be greedy for that little tax, and let the enclave of the Northern Continent become independent. Nothing happened now.

"Your Majesty, the situation in the Northern Continent is beyond recovery.

The Kingdom of Warhammer collapsed, the Three Kingdoms of the North Sea fell, the Principality of Orton was destroyed, and the Principality of Moxi was seriously injured. Except for the strength of the Kingdom of Alpha, there is no longer a strong country.

A few days ago, there was a wave of outbreaks in the Alpha Kingdom, which almost disabled the Alliance of the Ancient Remnants, but it was only a flash in the pan.

After the orcs launched the northern invasion, they had to concentrate their forces to defend the northern border, and they were powerless to stop the elves from going south.

The counties of Ruilin, Grint, and Nadal are all small countries. Korubia has been annexed by the Hessians long ago, and none of them are useful.

The remaining areas, except for the two enclaves of the kingdom, are all enclaves of other great nobles. Judging from the current situation, they are obviously ready to give up.

It's hard to survive alone, even if Wang Guo is willing to spend all his money, it will be difficult to hold on to those two enclaves now, so it's better to just give up.

It happened that the kingdom destroyed the half-orc kingdom, obtained a large area of ​​land, and directly transferred the local lords back to let them pay off the half-orc tribe. "

Prime Minister Duke Bergson suggested.

It is indeed bullying for the noble lord to abandon the well-developed cultivated land and instead manage a piece of raw land, but the current situation is special.

The army of elves is about to reach the door of the house, and if they don't run away, they will have no chance to run away. It is indeed a disadvantage economically, but compared with Xiaoming, it is not worth mentioning.

As long as the noble lord and the king agree to change the fiefdom, other people will naturally have no objections.

Even if a group of nobles came back to grab the cake, it would be better than dragging the kingdom down the endless abyss for a fief.

If it is really a fight with the elf army alone, no matter what the final outcome is, the Frankish Kingdom will be a loser.

"Your Majesty, the prime minister is right. There are only two enclaves, and it is not worth our trouble at all.

It is actually a good thing for the kingdom that the elves take action to rescue several foreign families in the Central Continent.

After digesting the land left by the half-orcs, the strength of the kingdom will surely be further improved, and the strength gap between countries will be further widened.

For the kingdom, what it needs most now is not to defeat the alien alliance, but to end the continental war as soon as possible.

As long as the human race is not defeated, the sooner the war ends, the better for us.

It is best to end this war before the Kingdom of Iberia solves the cannibals and the Holy See solves the dwarf king! "

Marquis Jesús made an ambitious proposal.

As Minister of Foreign Affairs, Marquis **** has long been dissatisfied with the current international situation. It's just that under the restraint of all parties, the Frankish Kingdom did not dare to break the balance rashly.

Right now is undoubtedly the best opportunity. Once his plan is completed, the situation on the mainland will definitely develop in a direction that is beneficial to the kingdom.

By annexing the Frankish Kingdom of the Orc Kingdom, it will be able to throw off its competitors in one fell swoop and become the only existence on the mainland.

International competition has always been slow step by step. Once the Frankish Kingdom turns its strategic advantage into strength, it will be difficult for countries to catch up.

After a slight hesitation, Charles III nodded.

"Then let's do this! By the way, tell the lords that when they evacuate, the generals will also be brought with them.

To develop the land left by the half-orcs, the kingdom still needs a large population. Not only their leaders, but also the war refugees from the Northern Continent would be brought back if conditions permit.

Prime Minister, organize the kingdom's fleet to pick it up. Let the navy **** everyone, and we must ensure the safety of the fleet.

Ministry of Foreign Affairs, send someone to communicate with the elves to make it easier for them. As long as the conditions are not too excessive, you can agree to them.

The war belonging to the kingdom is about to end, and the domestic business control can also be appropriately relaxed. "

As the first kingdom on the mainland, every move of the Frankish Kingdom will affect the direction of the situation on the mainland.

Charles III's words may seem ordinary, but they actually represent a strategic change in the Frankish kingdom.

Especially in the final liberalization of trade control, it is short of publicly expressing support for smuggling trade.

The internal trade of the human race has not been interrupted by the war. The so-called trade control is just to prevent strategic materials from flowing into the hands of foreign races.

Capital is greedy, wherever there is profit, it will go there. It is conceivable that after the Frankish Kingdom relaxes its crackdown on smuggling trade, how many strategic materials will flow into the hands of foreign races in the future.

Even for strategic purposes, the Frankish Kingdom may secretly and directly provide material support to certain alien races.

Similar operations have not happened in human history. It's just that they were all in peaceful times, and no one was foolish enough to support foreign races during the continental war.

Charles III dared to do this, the core factor is that the alien race is weak, and now it can no longer threaten the dominance of the human race.

From the performance of the various races during the war, it can be seen that many alien races are declining, and the only ones whose strength has not been affected are the elves.

However, everyone knows the shortcomings of the elves. They still have a detached status if they don't participate in the war. Once they are involved in the continental war, the family wealth they have painstakingly accumulated will be wiped out sooner or later.

It seems that they have made great progress all the way, but the price behind this is that tens of thousands of elf soldiers will fall to the ground forever.

Lost more than 10,000 soldiers in the Northern Continent, how much will be lost in the Central Continent?

Don't think that the three kingdoms in the mainland are not fighting well. It is mainly because they are preserving their strength and trying to use war to consume the power of small vassal states.

Stimulated by the elves, the performance of the armies of the Three Kingdoms on the battlefield has been raised to a new level in an instant these days.

Not to mention the loss of hundreds of thousands of troops, even a loss of 50,000 to 60,000 troops would be enough for the elves to suffer for a while.

If you want to fight for hegemony on the mainland, you must first solve the low birth rate of elves. Otherwise, the leading brother of the alien alliance can only work hard to keep the mainland peaceful.

…

By the Xueyue Lake, countless orcs drove their cattle and sheep and gathered here, making final preparations for the all-out war.

"The front line was fought very well, and the enemy's first line of defense was taken down without paying much price.

According to the past practice, Alpha's first pass is the most difficult to win. As long as this level is passed, the follow-up war will be much easier to fight. "

The Silver Moon Wolf Emperor said in a good mood.

Once Jin Jin gets the most suitable stage, he can immediately glow with his own light.

learn from mistakes.

After suffering from fighting independently, the Orc Empire has also undergone changes in military command.

Duke Daniel, who had outstanding military exploits, quickly stood out from the crowd of generals and became the commander-in-chief of the army appointed by the five emperors.

Duke Daniel lived up to expectations. After taking over the imperial army, not only did the attack speed increase, but even the casualties of the troops also decreased.

My son is so good at fighting, so I am naturally happy to be my son. As for the blemishes of indifference and lack of sociability, they were directly ignored by the Silver Moon Wolf Emperor.

When you look at a person pleasing to the eye, the disadvantages can also become advantages. This is the current situation, the original short board has now become "the arrogance of the emperor".

The rule of the game of the Orc Empire is Mu Qiang. Duke Daniel's outstanding military performance directly made him squeeze out the previous brothers and become the heir of the Silver Moon Wolf Clan.

The result came a bit suddenly. Even Daniel didn't expect that he, who was not liked by the nobles in the clan, was miraculously won the support of everyone.

Everything was forced out. After being chased and killed by the human race all the way, and driven into the barren land, the rich and powerful realized that if they want to enjoy a luxurious life, they must first let the race survive.

Daniel, who was the best at fighting, suddenly became a favorite. The former cold-faced duke directly became a "lonely emperor".

The other four royal families don't care about holding back and stabbing the knife now, so they should work together to eliminate their own threats.

It is not enough to destroy the Seven Kingdoms of the Grassland, the old enemy of the Alpha Kingdom must also be severely damaged. Otherwise, with the Alpha Kingdom taking the lead after the war, maybe with the support of the Human Race Alliance, the Seven Kingdoms will fight back again.

After all, the high-level executives of the Seven Prairie Kingdoms ran away completely, and these guys are backed by powerful forces. With a little help from one family, there will be an army to restore the country.

"This is not enough, the enemy's main force is still there. Now that the Western Front is over, it won't be long before the most elite expeditionary army of Alpha will appear on the battlefield.

Hudson is not as easy to fool as James. Since he entered the army, he has never been defeated.

With the current strength of the empire, it is only slightly stronger than the enemy. But they are on the defensive side, relying on the advantages of fortifications, they can basically wipe out our advantages.

Marshal Daniel, what are you going to do next? "

The Lion Emperor asked concerned.

If you don't have a solid family background, you can't mess around. The current Orc Empire wants to defeat the Alpha Kingdom without compromising too much strength.

"Then hurry up and fight the enemy ahead of time before Hudson arrives. Don't worry, the enemy has fallen into the trap and is now waiting to close the net.

Originally, I was thinking of waiting for the expeditionary army to come and swallow them together. But judging from the current situation, I am afraid that there is no chance.

This is also good, to save too many fish and burst the net.

After this battle, the empire will regain all the land lost in the previous war. No matter how powerful Hudson is, he has to have soldiers in his hands.

Of course, it is limited to severely inflicting damage to the Alpha Kingdom. If you want to destroy them, it may be difficult to achieve with the strength of the empire! "

Daniel said confidently.

In the eyes of others, being able to break through the enemy's strongest first line of defense so quickly is already a remarkable victory, but Daniel is not satisfied.

After one or two months of tossing, only one line of defense was taken down and tens of thousands of enemy troops were wiped out, which is simply weak.

According to this style of play, the war will evolve into a war of attrition in the middle and late stages. The current Orc Empire doesn't have so much cannon fodder available, and if it is consumed, both sides will suffer.
Chapter 448:
The King Chapter 448: Follow up and learn badly

The army returned to the city, and Caesar IV came out with all the officials, and Hudson also enjoyed the highest standard treatment.

It was all normal operations, and the record of the expeditionary force this time was full of legends in itself. What's more, there are negative teaching materials from allies to set off, making it even more difficult to win.

It can be seen that everyone is very satisfied. Apart from the coach Hudson who benefited from the brilliant victory of the expeditionary force, all the princes and nobles also benefited.

Military merit belongs to everyone. The children of each family who practiced together not only accumulated a wealth of combat experience, but also made a lot of military merit by the way.

The most important thing is that the death rate of elite children is low. Except for a few unlucky ones, the direct descendants of each family basically returned in triumph.

It's not that Hudson deliberately took care of them, but these people were already protected by experts arranged by various families. In the case of constantly winning battles, as long as you don't kill yourself, you basically can't die.

However, the small casualties are relatively speaking. When the 35,000 army went out, there were only more than 26,500 people left when they returned, and the battle loss rate was close to a quarter.

Heavy casualties do not mean a decline in combat effectiveness. After a series of victories, the expeditionary army has also displayed its own military spirit.

Stop there casually, everyone knows that these troops are elite, and the exposed aura is so strong that they can feel the murderous aura even if they are hundreds of meters away.

Fortunately, all the high-level leaders of the Alpha Kingdom came out of the army, otherwise they would have to make a fool of themselves on the spot after being so provoked by the expeditionary army.

Hudson obviously felt that Caesar IV had lost his composure, but he concealed it well, and few people noticed it.

As soon as the triumphant ceremony was over, it immediately entered the celebration part. It's really not easy. Since the outbreak of the Continental War, this is the first time the kingdom has held a banquet.

As the protagonist of the banquet, Hudson not only failed to feel like a fish in water, but was exhausted physically and mentally.

It is enjoyment to be worshiped by others, especially to be worshiped by the opposite sex. However, a beautiful noble lady is very eye-catching, and a group of beautiful noble ladies surround her, that is to suffer.

…

It's just that these cavalry usually return to their station immediately after going deep into dozens of miles and doing some damage.

This is the first time that something that is gone forever like now has happened.

"Why didn't you report this kind of thing in advance?"

James Marquis asked angrily.

It is an uncontrollable event that the enemy will never return, and no one knows in advance.

The cavalry crossing the border is also taking risks. If they are accidentally bitten by the army of the kingdom, they may be wiped out at any time.

I will take them to the front line after the expeditionary corps takes a short rest and replenishes their strength.

…”

The help is not for nothing. I owe such a big favor, and I will not be able to rely on the big nobles in the future.

Everyone present has a bit of integrity, and they can't do things that shake the foundation of the kingdom.

1 mu of land is equivalent to 1 gold coin, and you can directly gamble on it. As long as the kingdom wins the war, everyone can hold bonds for land.

In order to enhance confidence, Your Majesty is requested to set an example and assure the outside world that land bonds will be dealt with first.

After the war, the nobles were rewarded, and the fiefs of the small nobles were given priority, followed by the middle nobles, and then the big nobles and the royal family.

If the harvested land is not enough, then we people will not be divided.

Of course, if the kingdom is defeated, then these land bonds will be voided directly! "

us…"
